summary: Patches the mannequin duping bug, and has an optional fix for existing broken mannequins.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#bbbbbb]Do your mannequins have a mind of their own? Do they mysteriously procure new clothing every time you leave your house? Are you feeling bogged down by the sheer weight of the gold this has produced? Are you getting frustrated with your inability to tell your household furniture to follow your orders? If so, I have a solution!

Thanks to my MiracleCureâ„¢ (Completely unrelated to Brynjolf\'s obvious falsehoods!), you can wrest control of your house back from your maniacal mannequins, and restore order to even the craziest of homes!

This is a replacer for the default skyrim mannequin script, which has a bug that allows for infinite duplication of armor items, and permanently breaks the affected mannequin.

Both a fix for broken mannequins and a replacement script to prevent new breakages are included. For details on how to fix a broken mannequin, see the installation section in the optional file\'s README. [/color]
	
[size=5][b].-= Installation =-.[/b][/size]

[color=#bbbbbb]If you have broken mannequins, you\'ll need to download the optional hotfix, since the script included in the main file will only prevent them from breaking in the future.

If you do not have broken mannequins, extract the archive and place the script into the Data/Scripts folder for Skyrim.[/color]
  
[size=5][b].-= Requirements =-.[/b][/size]

[color=#bbbbbb]- Skyrim[/color]
author: Glitchfinder

files.name: Skyrim Mannequin Duping Bug Fix Original Package
